title: Publisher Rocket Review - Don't Buy Until You Watch This Review

How, what, how, why should you get Publisher Rocket aka KDP Rocket? This video is here to help you!

What Is Publish Rocket?
Publisher Rocket is a software you install on your PC. This software helps with keyword research, competition analysis and keywords for your Amazon campaigns.

Why Should You Get Publisher Rocket?
One of the main reasons why I use Publisher Rocket is for my Amazon advertisement campaigns. Whenever you publish a new campaign you should optimize the number of keyword. The maximum number is 1000 keywords.

By doing this, you increase the possibility of selling books. In other words, you can potentially make more money.

However, obtaining 1000 keyword manually is extremely monotonous. It will literally take you hours. Just imagine doing this for hundreds of campaigns?
